categories: Category:Battles of the Great Sith War

nodes.text: During the Great Sith War, the Galactic Republic forces, led by a member of the Jedi Order, performed a bombing raid on a Mandalorian settlement. One of the victims of the attack was a female named Varda, who was pregnant with the child of Dorjander Kace, a Jedi Knight who had been captured earlier in the war and was living among the Mandalorians.
